teper_ty_mozhesh_ne_tolko_pokupat_kotiko: Now you can not only buy cats, but also get offspring from them —
kupi_v_magazine_serogo_malchika_i_chernu: Buy a gray male and a black female in the shop. Let’s see whether this leads us to victory.
zoomagazin_bonifatsii_prisyal_otvet_na_t: The pet shop «Boniface» has sent a response to your deal. Click the envelope to read it.
teper_kotikov_nado_poselit_v_domik_davai: Now the cats need to be settled in a house. Let’s purchase it. You’ll need to return to the main screen.
bud_vnimatelen_kotyata_ubegayut_esli_po_: Be careful: kittens run away if they are not settled in a house at the end of the season.
kotyata_eshche_malenkie_oni_stanut_vzros: The kittens are still small; they will become adults when they reach
sezona_nazhmi_knopku_zavershit_sezon_i_k: seasons. Press the «End season» button and the kittens will become 1 season older.
pri_kazhdom_zavershenii_sezona_ty_budesh: At each season’s end you will see the overall results of the previous one.
nado_povzroslet_eshche_na: They need to grow up for
teper_mozhno_vygodno_prodat_kotyat_verni: Now you can profitably sell the kittens. Return to the main screen and enter the pet shop.
posmotri_v_tvoei_vitrine_vidno_tolko_mal: Look: your showcase displays only small kittens, because adult cats cannot be sold.
perenesi_vsekh_kotyat_iz_svoei_vitrine_v: Move all kittens from your showcase to the green deal zone and press the «Send» button.
sezonu_kupi_kotyat_i_poluchi_ot_nikh_pot: seasons. Buy kittens and get offspring from them, then sell newborn kittens to pet shops.
ne_toropis_srazu_prodavat_kuplennykh_pit: Do not hurry to sell the purchased pets right away, because now you have the opportunity to breed cats.
v_kazhdom_domike_est_4_bolshie_okna_dlya: Each house has 4 large windows for adult cats:
malenkhikh_okoshek_dlya_budushchikh_koty: There are small windows for future kittens — 6 windows on the left and 6 windows on the right. As a result, from two adult pairs in the house are born
my_nauchilis_razvodit_i_prodavat_kotikov: We have learned to breed and sell cats, and bought our first house. To complete the practical task, look at how we calculated it.
